example.text: The [[user]]’s irresponsible, inhumane so-called immigration plan would: ?Fund the wasteful border wall ?Criminalize asylum seekers ?Crush our agricultural workforce and drive up food prices It’s a catastrophe for #CA35 communities. I won’t let it happen.
